categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic droids

nodes.text: MGAD-47 was an AD-series weapons maintenance droid who served the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War. MGAD-37 was assigned to the Mon Calamari Star Cruiser Mantan Wanderer, overseeing the armory in Section Desh-32, which stored weaponry for Alliance Special Forces taskforce Team 19.
